normalised: Good news for all you folks dreaming of that sunny solar rooftop! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is still dishing out some sweet subsidies, making solar power a whole lot more affordable.

unnormalised: Good news for all you folks dreaming of that sunny solar rooftop! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still dishing out some sweet subsidies, making solar power a whole lot more affordable.
normalised: Thinking of powering your home in Kerala with clean energy? The Kerala State Electricity Board (K S E B) is also offering additional incentives on top of the central M N R E scheme! Imagine all the extra Onam Sadhya you could buy with the savings!

unnormalised: Thinking of powering your home in Kerala with clean energy? The Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB) is also offering additional incentives on top of the central MNRE scheme! Imagine all the extra Onam Sadhya you could buy with the savings!
normalised: The subsidy generally covers a significant chunk of the initial investment. You could get up to forty percent subsidy on systems up to three kilowatt and twenty percent beyond that, applicable pan-India. But remember, these things change like the weather, so best to check the latest guidelines on the M N R E website or with your local discom.

unnormalised: The subsidy generally covers a significant chunk of the initial investment. You could get upto 40% subsidy on systems upto 3 kW and 20% beyond that, applicable pan-India. But remember, these things change like the weather, so best to check the latest guidelines on the MNRE website or with your local discom.
normalised: Talk to your vendor about empanelled installers, like those approved in Bangalore, for hassle-free connections. Don't wait too long, these subsidies are getting as popular as Hyderabadi Biryani! This Diwali, light up your home with the power of the sun and save some rupees while you're at it! Last date to apply for current financial year is March thirty first!

unnormalised: Talk to your vendor about empanelled installers, like those approved in Bangalore, for hassle-free connections. Don't wait too long, these subsidies are getting as popular as Hyderabadi Biryani! This Diwali, light up your home with the power of the sun and save some ₹₹₹ while you're at it! Last date to apply for current financial year is March 31st!
